alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 9:05AM CDT until April 27 at 7:21PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From this morning to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occur from Panama to Arkoma. Some local and county roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 28.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
